messages.title: Education Funding
messages.content: Schools in Cambridgeshire are some of the lowest funded in the country. Julian fought a fair funding campaign which brought in millions of pounds of extra investment. But things are still tough and we need Julian's energy again to push for a fair deal for schools here.

messages.title: Local Connection
messages.content: He has lived here for decades—indeed, before he became an MP he was a local councillor here in Chesterton.

messages.title: Healthcare Funding
messages.content: He has consistently called for increased funding in our NHS.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour supported the Conservatives to vote for Article 50

issues.brexitEurope: Many people working at the science park, university and elsewhere are worried about the impact Brexit will have.
issues.economy: Single market access is so vital for our economy.
issues.education: Schools in Cambridgeshire are some of the lowest funded in the country.
issues.health: He has consistently called for increased funding in our NHS.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Cambridge, local councillor in Chesterton
politicalExperience.achievements: Fought a fair funding campaign which brought in millions of pounds of extra investment for schools.

endorsements.endorsement: As one of a few MPs with a background in science, Julian is well placed to stand up for Cambridge's science and technology sector.

images.caption: Leaflet content regarding Julian Huppert's candidacy for Cambridge.
